toys.title: Toy 1
toys.description: A durable, brightly colored wooden toy designed for shredding and chewing. Helps satisfy natural instincts and reduce boredom in small to medium parrots.

toys.title: Toy 2
toys.description: A combination swing and bell toy, offering both physical activity and auditory stimulation. Great for climbing and mental enrichment.

toys.title: Toy 3
toys.description: A safe, natural coconut shell house that provides a cozy, secure resting or hiding place for smaller birds like parakeets and cockatiels.

toys.title: Toy 4
toys.description: An advanced foraging toy that encourages problem-solving by requiring your parrot to manipulate mechanisms to retrieve treats.

toys.title: Toy 5
toys.description: Made from thick, bird-safe sisal rope knots, perfect for heavy chewers. Promotes beak health and provides strong visual interest.

toys.title: Toy 6
toys.description: A cube toy featuring a mirror for companionship and small plastic rings for playful interaction. Ideal for solitary birds.

food.title: food 1
food.description: A high-quality, balanced blend of essential seeds, grains, and nuts for the daily maintenance of medium-sized parrots. Vitamin fortified.

food.title: food 2
food.description: Uniform pellets containing all necessary nutrients, eliminating selective eating. Flavored with real dried tropical fruits.

food.title: food 3
food.description: A mix specifically formulated for easy sprouting, providing high levels of enzymes and amino acids for peak bird health.

accessories.title: Accessory 1
accessories.description: A durable, easy-to-clean stainless steel bowl that resists chewing and bacteria buildup. Comes with a secure cage mount.

accessories.title: Accessory 2
accessories.description: A cement-like perch that naturally files down nails and beak tips as the bird perches, reducing the need for manual trimming.

accessories.title: Accessory 3
accessories.description: A high-capacity, gravity-fed water dispenser that keeps water clean and fresh for longer periods, ideal for busy owners.

accessories.title: Accessory 4
accessories.description: Fine-mist spray bottle perfect for daily feather conditioning and maintaining necessary humidity for tropical parrots.

accessories.title: Accessory 5
accessories.description: Lightweight, breathable, and secure carrier for short trips to the vet or outdoor excursions. Includes a perch and two small cups.

accessories.title: Accessory 6
accessories.description: A safe UV lamp that mimics natural sunlight, crucial for Vitamin D3 synthesis and overall bone health when kept indoors.
